vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2261 for a metal salvage facility use on property zoned IM Industrial Manufacturing District, on the east line of Luna Road and on the north line of Ryan Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to conditions
Z-25-000089

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
